_question: What home warranty features does First American Home Warranty offer?
_answer: First American Home Warranty provides a comprehensive range of features designed to protect your home's essential systems and appliances. Our home warranty plans include the following - Major Systems Coverage, like HVAC Systems that air conditioning, heating, and ductwork, Plumbing Systems that cover leaks, stoppages, water heaters, and plumbing fixtures, and Electrical Systems that include wiring, panels, and outlets. We also offer Appliance Coverage that includes Kitchen Appliances, such as refrigerators, ovens, ranges, cooktops, and dishwashers, Laundry Appliances, including washers and dryers, and Other Appliances, like garage door openers, trash compactors, and built-in microwave ovens. We also offer the following Optional Add-Ons: Pool and Spa Equipment (Protection for your swimming pool and spa systems). Well Pump (Coverage for the well pump that supplies water to your home). Septic System (Including the septic tank and related components). Additional Refrigerators (Coverage for extra refrigerators or freezers). We also provide Enhanced Coverage Options: Refrigerant Recapture and Disposal to ensure environmentally safe handling of refrigerants. Crane Costs for situations requiring a crane to replace covered items. Haul Away for removal of replaced items. Permits to cover necessary permits required during repairs or replacements. We also focus on service excellence with 24/7 customer support for access to our customer service team at any time, we provide a network of qualified technicians to ensure high-quality repairs from trusted professionals, and we deliver an efficient claims process to simplify claims filing and quick service response. Lastly, we deliver innovative tools, like the First American Home Warranty AI Assistant that can assist with quotes, claims, and policy management, and an online portal to manage your policy, request service, and track claims online.
